mapper.select: SELECT user.id, user.username, user.password, user.createTime, user.state, user.roleId FROM fud.user
SELECT user.id, user.username, user.password, user.createTime, user.state, user.roleId FROM fud.user WHERE fud.user.roleId!=2 AND fud.user.roleId!=3
SELECT fud.user.* FROM fud.user WHERE user.username LIKE #{contents} AND fud.user.roleId!=3 AND fud.user.roleId!=2 ORDER BY fud.user.id
